attributes.action: Exempt Turkish ECAA visa holders from 10-year ILR
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government to act because many ECAA visa holders applied before Brexit, have lived and worked in the UK, paid taxes, and are close to completing 5 years. Applying the 10-year rule now would be unfair.
attributes.background: We ask the UK Government not to apply the 10-year ILR rule to ECAA visa holders. Many applied before Brexit, worked, paid taxes, and are near 5 years. We request exemption or a transitional arrangement.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition: "Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing ECAA visa holders" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745599
